alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Beltrami and southeastern Lake of the Woods Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Upper Red Lake to Lower Red Lake. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Upper Red Lake around 505 PM CDT. Ponemah around 510 PM CDT. Shotley around 530 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami
